cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 1st Nov 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 1st Nov 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 6 Bed Privacy Share + Attached Ensuite right outside your door is the ultimate space for that single traveller, a couple of friends or group of 6. A/C and equipped with double power point, bed light, personal shelf and a secure locker unit.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 4 Bed Privacy Share + Attached Ensuite with bathroom right outside your door is the ultimate space for that single traveller, a couple of friends or group of 4.  A/C and equipped with double power point, bed light, personal shelf and secure locker unit.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

dorms.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
4 Bed Privacy Share + Ensuite to yourselves is the ultimate space for that single traveller, a couple of friends or group of 4.  

A/C and equipped with double power point, bed light, your own personal shelf and a secure locker unit.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

dorms.name: Deluxe 6 Bed Female Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 6 Privacy Bed (Female) + Ensuite is a popular choice for women. Those extra things we need like curtains on each bunk for privacy, a towel, hairdryer, straightener - you get it all! Air conditioning keeps this room cool in summer and warm in winter.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Deluxe 6 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Enjoy some privacy with curtains on each bunk of our 6-share room with ensuite. Featuring a balcony and a view, this room has A /C and is equipped with a hair dryer, personal power points, bed lights, personal shelves and a secure locker units.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Our first floor Private King + Shared Ensuite is a super comfy King bed splits to twin single. There is a sliding door out to the covered walkway and the ensuite is shared with the Private Queen.  Perfect for a minimum 1 night stay. Advise if twin setup.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 2 nights stay on your dates

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Our Private Queen + Ensuite is a lovely room located on the first level overlooking the courtyard trees. Is the perfect getaway for a couple to have your own private space but enjoy the vibe of the hostel. Includes a flat screen smart TV.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
